channel.title: [508+] Npc Drops
channel.description:
ok atm i have the settings so when a group of players are fighting an npc the player being attacked get the loot. how to i make it so the player who has dealt the most damage to the npc gets loot?
also does any one know how to make a economy reset batch file?
